content.para: The 3.6.2 release introduces minor bug fixes and improvements.

tr.td: Clusters with multiple labels in the webapp.

td.p: The webapp will display a full set of labels for clusters with multiple labels.

tr.td: Attribute settings loading could fail with an NPE.

td.p: Attribute settings could not load properly if null value (missing value) was present in persisted values.
Improved error reporting on depleted Bing3 API limits. Improved error reporting on missing Webkit components in Linux.
Decreased required memory footprint for visualizations with large input documents and document sets. Print function will now work in visualizations (affects google chrome only).

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.6.2.
